demoliciones.title: DEMOLITIONS
demoliciones.description: Professional service for safe and efficient structural dismantling. We guarantee a controlled process, complying with regulations and preparing the site for new projects.
demoliciones.detailedDescription:
Our demolition service covers everything from partial dismantling to the complete teardown of buildings, ensuring maximum safety and efficiency at every stage of the process. Before beginning any work, we carry out a comprehensive technical analysis to determine the most appropriate strategy based on the characteristics of the structure, the surrounding environment, and the client’s specific requirements.

To execute the work, we rely on specialized machinery and apply controlled demolition techniques, which help minimize the impact on neighboring areas while ensuring the safe progress of the project. At the same time, we manage all waste in compliance with current environmental regulations, keeping the site clean, orderly, and risk-free.

Our team of experts ensures that the land is fully cleared and prepared for the next stage of the project, such as foundations or new construction. We adhere strictly to agreed timelines and quality standards, prioritizing both worker safety and environmental protection.
benefits: Certified operational safety and regulatory compliance
Technical planning that reduces time and unforeseen events
Minimization of impacts (noise, dust, vibration)
Comprehensive waste management and removal logistics
Delivery of a site in optimal condition for new construction
Guaranteed adherence to deadlines and quality standards
serviceTypes: Selective manual demolition (walls, slabs, partitions, tiles)
Mechanical demolition with specialized equipment
Cutting and removal of structural elements as per design
Dismantling of roofs, carpentry, finishes and fixed furniture
Management of permits, licenses and environmental plans
Signage, fencing and onsite safety control
Handling, loading, transportation and disposal of debris
Site cleaning and preparation for subsequent phases
demoliciones.heroImageAlt: Controlled demolition with machinery and safety equipment
demoliciones.ctaDescription: Request a free quote with no commitment. Our team will contact you in less than 24 hours.

cimentacion.title: FOUNDATION
cimentacion.description: We build the solid and durable foundations your building needs. We create safe and stable foundations, calculated to guarantee the longevity of your project.
cimentacion.detailedDescription:
Foundations are the essential base of any safe and long-lasting construction, as they are responsible for properly transferring the structure’s loads to the ground. Our foundation services cover everything from the initial soil studies to the execution of both shallow and deep foundations, fully adapting to the geotechnical characteristics of the terrain and the structural requirements of each project.

We apply modern construction techniques and use high-quality materials to guarantee the stability, strength, and durability of the structure over time. Our team of specialists performs rigorous quality control at every stage of the process, including excavation, reinforcement placement, concrete pouring, and curing. This ensures that each foundation meets all technical specifications and current building codes.

Through this comprehensive approach, we provide solutions that not only support the building safely but also help prevent future issues such as differential settlements, leaks, or structural failures, giving our clients the confidence of having a solid and reliable base.
benefits: Guaranteed long-term structural safety and stability
Adaptation to the specific characteristics of the terrain
Strict compliance with technical standards and building codes
Use of high-quality materials and modern construction methods
Reduced risk of settlements and structural failures
Expert supervision at all stages of the process
Delivery of foundations ready to efficiently support subsequent phases of construction
serviceTypes: Soil studies and geotechnical analysis
Execution of shallow foundations: isolated, strip, and combined footings
Construction of deep foundations: piles and caissons
Installation of mat foundations for distributed loads
Construction of retaining walls and drainage systems
Soil improvement and stabilization when required
Quality control of materials and construction processes
cimentacion.heroImageAlt: Construction workers on-site performing foundation work.
cimentacion.ctaDescription: Request a free quote with no commitment. Our team will contact you in less than 24 hours.

company.name: AGL CONSTRUCCIONES
company.description: We are a company specialized in remodeling and construction of residential, commercial and office spaces. With years of experience in the sector, we have established ourselves as leaders in space transformation.
company.mission: We turn ideas into successful projects: we plan, execute, and deliver works with innovative processes, rigorous quality control, and personalized attention. Our commitment is to maximize the client's investment, meet deadlines, and exceed expectations with solutions that provide durability, aesthetics, and return.
company.vision: To be the preferred construction company for clients and investors, recognized for delivering profitable, innovative, and high-quality projects that generate immediate and sustainable value.

calidad_exigente.title: Demanding quality
calidad_exigente.description: We guarantee processes and finishes with rigorous controls to deliver projects that exceed expectations.

innovacion_constructiva.title: Construction innovation
innovacion_constructiva.description: We incorporate methods and materials that reduce time and improve efficiency without sacrificing robustness.

compromiso_con_el_cliente.title: Client commitment
compromiso_con_el_cliente.description: Personalized attention, meeting deadlines, and focusing on maximizing the client's return on investment.

eficiencia_y_rentabilidad.title: Efficiency and profitability
eficiencia_y_rentabilidad.description: We optimize costs and resources to offer projects with the best cost-benefit ratio.

seguridad_y_salud_ocupacional.title: Occupational health and safety
seguridad_y_salud_ocupacional.description: We prioritize protocols and best practices to protect our team and clients on-site.

transparencia_y_cumplimiento.title: Transparency and compliance
transparencia_y_cumplimiento.description: Clear reporting, document management, and regulatory compliance ensure trust and control.

sostenibilidad_y_responsabilidad.title: Sustainability and responsibility
sostenibilidad_y_responsabilidad.description: We integrate practices that reduce environmental impact and contribute to the well-being of communities.

trabajo_en_equipo_y_talento.title: Teamwork and talent
trabajo_en_equipo_y_talento.description: We foster training, leadership, and collaboration to achieve better results.

why_choose_us.title: Why choose us?
why_choose_us.description: With more than 10 years of experience, we have completed hundreds of successful projects. Our team of expert professionals guarantees exceptional results in every project.
why_choose_us.cta: Contact us today for a free consultation and discover how we can transform your space.

cta_sidebar.description: Request a free quote with no commitment. Our team will contact you in less than 24 hours.

projects.title: Our Projects
projects.subtitle: Discover some of our featured projects

altos-de-tundama.title: ALTOS DE TUNDAMA
altos-de-tundama.description: Comprehensive finishing project for the Altos de Tundama residential complex...

universidad-santo-tomas-tunja.title: UNIVERSIDAD SANTO TOMAS DE TUNJA
universidad-santo-tomas-tunja.description: Structural masonry construction for a new 3-story academic block. Specialized work on load-bearing walls, exposed brick facades, and decorative architectural elements combining functionality with modern institutional design.

entreparques.title: ENTREPARQUES
entreparques.description: Masonry development for a 15-story residential tower. Construction of partition walls, ventilated facades, and complementary structural elements using advanced techniques and high-resistance materials to ensure durability and aesthetics.

colegio-tapsandes.title: COLEGIO TAPSANDES
colegio-tapsandes.description: Educational infrastructure executed with seismic standards and quality control.

mega-colegio-san-marcos-funza.title: MEGA COLEGIO SAN MARCOS FUNZA
mega-colegio-san-marcos-funza.description: Reinforced concrete structure for a large-scale educational complex. Includes columns, beams, slabs, and special structural elements designed to support large spans and loads, complying with current seismic regulations.

urbanizacion-hacienda-los-lagos.title: URBANIZACIÓN HACIENDA LOS LAGOS
urbanizacion-hacienda-los-lagos.description: Deep foundation for a residential development of 120 homes. Excavation, piling, and construction of strip footings with integrated drainage systems. Specialized technical work in soils with high geotechnical complexity.

edificio-q097.title: EDIFICIO Q097
edificio-q097.description: Complete reinforced concrete structure for an 8-story residential building. Construction of moment-resisting frames, lightweight slabs, stairs, and special structural elements with integrated architectural finishes.

altos-de-tundama.title: ALTOS DE TUNDAMA
altos-de-tundama.description: Comprehensive finishing project for the Altos de Tundama residential complex...

technicalSpecs: Final finishes (stucco, vinyl paint, and drywall ceilings)

universidad-santo-tomas-tunja.title: UNIVERSIDAD SANTO TOMAS DE TUNJA

heroImage.alt: Universidad Santo Tomas de Tunja - Academic block construction

technicalSpecs: Confined masonry (common block, columns, and joists)
universidad-santo-tomas-tunja.results: Modern academic block combining structural strength with institutional architectural design, complying with all educational and seismic regulations.

entreparques.title: ENTREPARQUES
entreparques.description: Masonry development for a 15-story residential tower. Construction of partition walls, ventilated facades, and complementary structural elements using advanced techniques and high-resistance materials to ensure durability and aesthetics.

entreparques.results: High-quality residential tower setting new standards in vertical construction, combining advanced masonry techniques with contemporary design.

mega-colegio-san-marcos-funza.title: MEGA COLEGIO SAN MARCOS FUNZA

heroImage.alt: Mega Colegio San Marcos Funza - Structure under construction

technicalSpecs: Exposed façade masonry (Santa Fe brick, grid-type)
mega-colegio-san-marcos-funza.results: Educational complex with a state-of-the-art structure enabling large open spaces, meeting the highest standards of seismic safety and educational functionality.
